nrecognised temporary differences relating to investments in subsidiaries andjointly controlled entities

At the end of the ﬁnancial years ended 31 December 2016 and 31 December 2017, there is no deferred tax liability that needs 0 be recognised for taxes that would be payable on the undistn'buted earnings of certain of the Group’s subsidiaries and jointly controlled entities as the Group has determined that if any undistributed earnings of its subsidiaries and jointly controlled entities are distributed in the foreseeable future, there will be no material tax impact,
